    // A small debounce
    function debounce(fn, delay = 100) {
      let frame
      return (...args) => {
        if (frame) cancelAnimationFrame(frame)
        frame = requestAnimationFrame(() => fn(...args))
      }
    }

    function storeScroll() {
      // Try to find an element with the classes `.navbar.w-nav`
      const nav = document.querySelector('.navbar.w-nav')
      if (nav) {
        nav.setAttribute('data-scroll', window.scrollY)
      } else {

      }
    }

  window.addEventListener('scroll', storeScroll)

})();

<script>

//Update current year on footer

 $('#current-year').text(new Date().getFullYear());

//Newsletter Submit

$('.newsletter-submit-button').on('click', function() {
  $('.form-submit').click();
});

//-------------Newsletter Email Validation-----------//

// Get the input element and the submit button
const emailInput = document.querySelector('#newsletter-mail-input');
const submitButton = document.querySelector('.newsletter-submit-button');

// Function to validate email
function validateEmail(email) {
  const re = /^[^\s@]+@[^\s@]+\.[^\s@]+$/;
  return re.test(email);
}

// Add an event listener for input changes
if (emailInput) {
  emailInput.addEventListener('input', function () {
    if (validateEmail(this.value)) {
      submitButton.classList.add('active');
    } else {
      submitButton.classList.remove('active');
    }
